EmailTemplate.name: New/Same Position Relo Scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Relocation__c} Relocation Scheduled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Relocation__c} relocation has been scheduled.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
